QueryDefinition.Query:
select cast(p.patient_sk AS BIGINT) AS person_id, lower(gender) as gender, race, case when lower(race) = 'caucasian' then 8527 when lower(race) = 'african american' then 8516 when lower(race) = 'hispanic' then 0 when lower(race) = 'asian' then 8515 when lower(race) = 'native american' then 8657 when lower(race) = 'biracial' then 0 when lower(race) = 'pacific islander' then 38003613 when lower(race) = 'asian/pacific islander' then 38003613 when lower(race) = 'mid eastern indian' then 38003615 else 0 end as RaceConceptId, case when lower(race) = 'hispanic' then 38003563 else 38003564 end as EthnicityConceptId, age_in_years, age_in_months, case when age_in_months is null and age_in_years is null then 0 when age_in_years < 2 and age_in_months is not null then DATEPART(YEAR, DATEADD(MONTH, -1 * age_in_months, admitted_dt_tm)) else DATEPART(YEAR, DATEADD(YEAR, -1 * age_in_years, admitted_dt_tm)) end as year_of_birth, DATEPART(MONTH, DATEADD(MONTH, -1 * age_in_months, admitted_dt_tm)) as month_of_birth, admitted_dt_tm, discharged_dt_tm,
encounter_id as visit_occurrence_id, e.patient_type_id, case when e.patient_type_id = 98 THEN 9202 when e.patient_type_id = 84 THEN 9203 when e.patient_type_id = 87 THEN 9201 when e.patient_type_id in (145,108,86,90) THEN 42898160 ELSE 9202 end as visit_concept_id, prov.physician_id as provider_id, cast(ISNULL(cast(hospital_id as varchar), '') + ISNULL(cast(e.discharge_caresetting_id as varchar), '') as int) as care_site_id, pt.patient_type_desc as visit_source_value, pr.payer_code_desc, p.marital_status as observation_source_value, case lower(p.marital_status) when 'married' THEN 4338692 when 'single' THEN 4053842 when 'divorced' THEN 4069297 when 'widowed' THEN 4143188 when 'legally separated' THEN 4027529 when 'life partner' THEN 4212893 else 0 end as observation_concept_id, e.payer_id FROM {sc}.hf_d_patient as p JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.patient_sk = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE JOIN {sc}.hf_f_encounter as e on e.patient_id = p.patient_id LEFT JOIN {sc}.hf_d_patient_type as pt on pt.patient_type_id = e.patient_type_id LEFT JOIN {sc}.hf_d_payer as pr on pr.payer_id = e.payer_id LEFT JOIN {sc}.hf_d_physician as prov on admitting_physician_id = prov.physician_id order by p.patient_sk
